Published October 30 2014

A happy font family

A happy font family — Jonathan Hoefler and Tobias Frere-Jones have resolved their legal dispute, which started back in January. Hoefler will continue to lead H&Co., and Frere-Jones looks to “return to design work and to launch my own type design practice in the new year.”

Enjoy your day.
